T02D3278:26b-1: tree lokya bi dza ya s'a dha nam /
T02D3278:26b-3: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3278:26b-4: sngar bshad pa'i cho gas nyi ma la yi ge
T02D3278:26b-5: h'um mthing nag las byung ba'i rje btsun khams gsum
T02D3278:26b-7: sku mdog mthing nag zhal bzhi pa /
T02D3278:26b-9: zhal dang po khro bo sgeg pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D3278:26b-10: g-yas pa ni drag rkan dang ldan pa'o //
T02D3278:26b-11: g-yon pa ni shin tu 'jigs su rung ba'o //
T02D3278:26b-12: rgyab ma ni dpa' bo'i nyams su ldan pa'o //
T02D3278:26b-13: rdo rje dang dril bu dang ldan pa'i phyag gnyis
T02D3278:26b-14: kyis ni thugs kar rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag
T02D3278:26b-15: rgya 'dzin pa / g-yas pa'i phyag gsum gyis ni ral gri dang lcags kyu dang mda' bsnams pa'o //
T02D3278:26b-16: g-yon pa'i phyag gsum gyis ni gzhu dang /
T02D3278:26b-19: zhabs g-yon pa brkyang bskum gyis dbang phyug chen po'i mgo bo mnan pa /
T02D3278:26b-20: zhabs g-yas pa goo r'i nu ma gnyis kun nas mnan pa /
T02D3278:26b-21: sangs rgyas kyi phreng ba dang phreng ba la sogs
T02D3278:26b-22: pa rnam par bkra ba'i na bza' dang rgyan dang
T02D3278:26b-23: ldan par bdag nyid rnam par bsams la phyag rgya
T02D3278:26b-25: de la khu tshur gnyis kyi rgyab sbyar la mthe'u
T02D3278:26b-26: chung gnyis lu gu rgyud kyi rnam par sbyar bar
T02D3278:26b-30: grihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya h'um /
T02D3278:26b-31: a'a na ya ho bha ga b'a na bi dy'a r'a dza h'um phat /
T02D3278:26b-32: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i sgrub thabs so /
